enterNino.title: What is your National Insurance number?
enterNino.heading: What is your National Insurance number?
enterNino.hint: It’s on your National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60. For example, ‘QQ 12 34 56 C’

detail.summaryText: I do not have my National Insurance number
detail.text:
We need to know your National Insurance number to check if you are eligible for Healthy Start vouchers. If you do not have a National Insurance number, please
visit GOV.UK (link opens in a new tab) for help.

enterNino.invalidNino: Enter a National Insurance number in the correct format

enterName.title: What is your name?
enterName.heading: What is your name?
enterName.formDescription: Tell us your full legal name as it appears on your passport or other benefit claims.
enterName.firstNameTooLong: Enter a shorter first or given name
enterName.missingLastName: Enter your last or family name
enterName.lastNameTooLong: Enter a shorter last or family name
